**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This basic snare consists of hidden spikes that rely on a creature's momentum to lacerate or potentially impale it as it enters the snare's square, dealing 2d8 piercing damage. The creature must attempt a DC 17 [basic](/Actions.aspx?ID=2765) Reflex saving throw.
